data.actual_result: The NSFW warning is hidden until tapping on Discord, allowing you to see in it. If the warning is still visible, you may need to resize the window a little bit
data.expected_result: The NSFW warning stays, obscuring the content of the channel
data.short_description: [Android 7.0+ Only] NSFW Warning disappears when opening the split screen/multi-window mode chooser
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a NSFW channel or open a channel that doesn't have the NSFW warning accepted - Tap and hold on the app switcher to bring up the split screen/multi-window mode chooser
